k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    s = s[:k] + '...'
    print(s)

import sys

k = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline()

if len(s) > k:
    print(s[:k] + "...")
else:
    print(s)

import sys

k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) > k:
    print(s[:k] + "...")
else:
    print(s)

import sys

first_line = sys.stdin.readline()
second_line = sys.stdin.readline()

if len(second_line) <= int(first_line):
    print(second_line.rstrip())
else:
    print(second_line[:int(first_line)] + '...')
